attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Assist in Createing a NATIONAL MEMORIAL with public subscripions to the over 55.000 young men ( ALL VOLUNTEERS)Of R.A.F Bomber Command who gave there lives and helped ensure Victory in 1945, 
This should be erected near the 'Battle of Britain'Memorial in London.

rejection.details: The title must be a call to action not your name.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
